definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shine, beam (Aram.) (NH id., esp. in deriv.; As. nûru, light, Dl:HWB 440; Ar.nahirun daytime, naha0run day, daytime; Aram. nhar shine, [[נְהַר]] id.; Palm. [[נהירא]]  illustrious, e.g. Vog:Palm. No. 22);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf 2 fs. consec. [[וְנׇהַרְתְּ]] Is 60:5; 3 pl. [[נׇהָָרוּ]] Ps 34:6; —beam, be radiant, fig. of joy: ´[[תִּרְאִי וְנ]] Is 60:5, ´[[הִבִּיטוּ אֵלָיו וְנ]] Ps 34:6 (rd. ´[[הַבּ]], [[וּנְהָרוּ]], v. LXX SyrVer Vulgate Che Bae Du).
